name: Deliver Us From Zombies
description:
The game spawns you with a vehicle in a zombie captured city. The only way to escape demands you a high driving skill to pass through the roads with death as under tone.

Escape the area before time runs out!

Made by students of VIT-Bhopal 1st year (CSE with specialization in game technology-game programing).

Anurag Pathak (https://anurag-pathak.itch.io/)

Aakash Gupta(https://aakashh0-0.itch.io/)

Anas Ahmad Khan(https://khan0743.itch.io/)

-GOVIT  [Gamers Of  VIT]
